body_html: Also, I thought you were with AMD from your github, but it seems you're a "rogue agent" doing this whole CUDA-on-CL thing on your own time. Thanks sincerely for spearheading this! Is there some way that I and others can contribute for your efforts, perhaps by crowdfunding you a GPU? Or you could set up a Patreon, I'm happy to sign up for a monthly contribution to the project?

body: Also, I thought you were with AMD from your github, but it seems you're a "rogue agent" doing this whole CUDA-on-CL thing on your own time. Thanks sincerely for spearheading this! Is there some way that I and others can contribute for your efforts, perhaps by crowdfunding you a GPU? Or you could set up a Patreon, I'm happy to sign up for a monthly contribution to the project?
